rules.natural: Whenever John publishes a paper called neural_net_paper, it follows that the neural_net_paper uses the technology deep learning.
If the Unix Lab is funded by the tech grant, then whenever the neural_net_paper uses the technology deep learning, it follows that if John works for the Unix Lab, John has the job of researcher.
Either the Unix Lab is funded by the tech grant, or the Unix Lab is funded by a private donation.
Provided that the Unix Lab is funded by a private donation, if the neural_net_paper uses the technology deep learning, then if John works for the Unix Lab, John has the job of researcher.
If John retains his position, then it is not the case that John’s job is terminated.
If it is not the case that if John does not receive the tech grant, then John has the job of researcher, then John’s job is terminated.
If it is not the case that if John does not receive the tech grant, then John has the job of researcher, then John retains his position.
If John does not receive the tech grant, then John works for the Unix Lab.

John does not have the job of researcher.
